replies.msg:
平時我都係用開iphone錄cover
想買支mic錄自彈自唱，我支木結他冇得駁線嘅，想問下$1000-2000 budget左右有冇推介?
另外想問埋，因為自己都有玩電結他，如果想下電結他嘅cover，係咪買個audio interface會好啲?咁樣係咪可以兩份用?

My spec:

Mic: Yanmai Q8
Interface: Scarlett Solo
Mic stand and pop filter (防止噴mic 聲被錄到）
睇下你用咩OS, Mac 定win, 買返啱嘅線用 有 pro logic x 軟件，走音王都變歌神

價錢自己上price.com睇，都係啲鴨記深水埗買。

咪嘅話其實自己未試過都唔知係咪真係啱自己如果係第一支咪，我會建議你揀支自己覺得個樣順眼嘅唔啱就放返出去揀第支
如果要講質素嘅話，Rode NT1A、Audio Technica AT2020、AKG C3000之類嘅電容咪都好多人揀，我個人就最中意NT1A

如果真係想錄音質素好啲，都真係走唔甩要買部interface
好多人新手入門會揀Focusrite，因為都真係幾平，如果你想平平地買部錄人聲+結他，Scarlett Solo都夠用，一千蚊有找。但就得一個mic in同一個instrument in/line in，變相結他只能夠插jack錄，唔可以開多支咪錄

去到Scarlett 2i2就有2 mic in + 2instrument/line in，$12xx左右。

如果想質素再靚啲又唔介意比多幾百蚊，可以諗下SSL 2一千尾，我自己有一部，條mic pre真係完勝Focusrite
唔該晒巴打，咁如果我想買埋interface的話，我見Focusrite Scarlett 2i2有個原廠package係包埋耳機同mic，抵唔抵買?個mic會唔會好廢?定係單買佢個interface，然後買支其他牌子嘅mic?
Lm

quote.msg: 唔該晒巴打，咁如果我想買埋interface的話，我見Focusrite Scarlett 2i2有個原廠package係包埋耳機同mic，抵唔抵買?個mic會唔會好廢?定係單買佢個interface，然後買支其他牌子嘅mic?

replies.msg: 隨便想問埋SSL2同埋SSL2+有咩大分別?

反而想問下有無d器材係錄出來似iPhone 個錄音app效果
唔知點解iPhone錄video or其他mic apps錄video就做唔到個效果

我試過用focusrite scarlett 2i2 玩 cover （with iphone), 用專業recording app 應該問題不大，但我用全民party 來錄就有問題，因為個mic audio得single channel.... 未知點解決⋯ 問咗focusrite cs, 都話單聲道mic audio, 唔會變雙聲道，除未sw mix, 但全民party 無得mix left right channel, 唔知有無高手指點下。

replies.msg:
耳機梗係自己買個靚既，平時聽歌都可以用
如果你想係錄既時候戴住耳機mon/播音樂，就要買close back耳機唔可以買open back，唔係有機會耳機漏音比mic pick up到

quote.msg: 唔該晒巴打，咁如果我想買埋interface的話，我見Focusrite Scarlett 2i2有個原廠package係包埋耳機同mic，抵唔抵買?個mic會唔會好廢?定係單買佢個interface，然後買支其他牌子嘅mic?

耳機梗係自己買個靚既，平時聽歌都可以用
如果你想係錄既時候戴住耳機mon/播音樂，就要買close back耳機唔可以買open back，唔係有機會耳機漏音比mic pick up到

replies.msg: 咁係咪即係用返平時打機嗰啲headset都冇問題? 因為見佢又係close back 又唔算平價貨

唔好意思 巴打們 搭單問
我完全唔識
係咪大部分錄音靚少少都可以錄到樂器
我個果係共振較多既工具 係咪好難錄
btw 巴打們有冇邊間舗頭好介紹?

睇錄音環境
好就人聲condenser mic，guitar用mic收
如果差可能guitar諗辦法line in仲方便，如果唔係收晒雜音，人聲用返dynamic mic無咁敏感
加多少少上Sony c800g

I'm a violinist. In the last few years, I've performed several times in concerts which have been greeted with widespread critical acclaim by the media. My last few concerts attracted audiences of more than one thousand. Recently, I was interviewed on a news television channel for the first time to promote my recital. I was a little nervous since it was my first time being intrrviewed on television but it was an enjoyable experience. Besides performing, I also do piano accompaniment so I always have rehearsals with cellists, violists, flutists, oboists, et cetera. I also teach piano but I only teach the talented ones. Some of the students are forced by their parents to learn to play the piano which they aren't really interested in learning. They don't do much practice. Do you play any sports? I'm a gym lover. I go to the gym three to four times a week. I would say I'm lean and strong. I don't wanna be too big like a bodybuilder because if I were, I'd be so clumsy and my hands and fingers wouldn't be nimble enough to play the piano. I also enjoy hiking and playing basketball and badminton. Maybe you could be my hiking buddy. Do you like thrill rides like roller coasters? I think you're quite adventurous like me. I went bungee jumping twice in Macau. I bungee-jumped off Macau Tower. The top of Macau Tower is the highest place in Macau. This tower is taller than any buildings in Macau. Immediately before I jumped, I was nervous and a little scared. All the buildings and hotels including The Parisian Macao looked so short. When I was falling, it was surreal and absolutely exhilarating. Do you like roller coasters? The most exciting roller coasters are in Fuji-Q Highland in Tokyo. Three of its roller coasters broke the Guinness World Records. The feelings before I made my bungee jump were different to those before I went on the roller coasters in Tokyo. Right before I rode those roller coasters, I felt absolutely exhilarated whereas right before I did the bungee jumps, I felt nervous and frightened but of course, bungee jumping was a thrilling experience. Some people are crazy about bungee jumping, whether they bungee-jumped off a tower or out of a helicopter. I'd love to go skydiving one day. It'd be a once in a lifetime experience.

樓主熟唔熟mixing同埋mic placement既野？
如果你本身唔太識 你直接用iphone 錄哂聲畫 唔係講笑 mic放得唔好+唔識mix仲衰過iphone錄

另外你真係想買架生 當然買電容咪 for收哂木結+人聲 不過錄嗰時後面放塊廉之類reduce間房既回音反應 你budget得2000可能只係買d package....
你可以係mic18 睇睇 當然你可以格下價

Interface都唔使多講 樓上都答左你好多
剩係既靠你既才能
